title.rendered: Insurance Verification & Authorization Specialist  | Tulsa, OK

content.rendered:
Insurance Verification & Authorization Specialist | Tulsa, OK
  • Full-Time Monday-Friday 8am-5pm
  • Responsible for insurance verification and authorizations
  • Must have 1+ year with medical insurance verification, authorizations and speaking with insurance companies
  • Experience with Medicare, Medicaid and Indian Heath Care is a PLUS
  • Prefer experience reading EOBs and working with Electronic Medical Records
  • $13-$14/hour
